pullRequest.title: Remove SearchContext from constructing aggregations
pullRequest.bodyText:
This replaces the SearchContext passed to the ctor of Aggregations
with AggregationContext. It ends up adding a fairly large number of
methods to AggregationContext but in exchange it shows a path to
removing a few methods from SearchContext. That seems nice!
It also gives us an accurate inventory of "all of the stuff" that
aggregations use to build and run.

nodes.bodyText: Does changing the exception type here preserve the HTTP status code if we hit this error?  If not, that might be a breaking change.  I think I saw a couple of other exception type changes, same question applies.
This is nitpicky even for me, but I don't think this javadoc is adding any knowledge.
